result.purpose: Responsible for managing database interactions related to DApp sites and tokens.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern, encapsulating database access logic for DApp sites and tokens.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/constants.g.purpose: Defines constants for database columns and tables related to token and platform information.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/dappsite.go.purpose: This file defines a repository interface and implementation for managing DApp site records in a database.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/dappsite_mo.purpose: Defines a data model for dApp sites and provides conversion functions between database and application models.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/token.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing token data in a database.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/token_model.purpose: Defines the Token and TokenPlatform models for managing cryptocurrency token data in a database.

internal/domains/proxy/repos/token_test..purpose: Unit tests for CRUD operations on the PgToken repository.
